packets.name: Disconnect
packets.description: Client sends disconnect notification.

packets.name: Attack Request
packets.description: Client requests to attack a mobile.

packets.name: Text Command
packets.description: Client sends text-based commands for skills, spells, virtues, etc.

fields.name: Command
fields.description: Command-specific text (skill ID, spell ID, etc.)

packets.name: Resynchronize
packets.description: Client requests full world state resync.
packets.notes: Not related to outgoing 0x22 (Movement Acknowledgment) despite sharing the same packet ID.

packets.name: Death Status Response
packets.description: Client acknowledges death status packet. Currently ignored by server.

packets.name: Mobile Query
packets.description: Client queries information about a mobile (stats or skills).

related.note: Mobile Status packet sent in response to stats query
Skills Update sent in response to skills query

packets.name: Change Skill Lock
packets.description: Client changes the lock state of a skill.

packets.name: Set War Mode
packets.description: Client toggles war/peace mode.

fields.name: Warmode
fields.description: True = war mode, False = peace mode

packets.name: Ping Request
packets.description: Client sends ping for latency measurement.

packets.name: Menu Response
packets.description: Client responds to a displayed item menu.

packets.name: Hue Picker Response
packets.description: Client responds to a hue picker dialog.

packets.name: ASCII Prompt Response
packets.description: Client responds to an ASCII text prompt.

related.note: Unicode Prompt packet that triggered this response

packets.name: Help Request
packets.description: Client requests help/GM assistance.

packets.name: System Info
packets.description: Client sends system/hardware information.

packets.name: Request Scroll Window
packets.description: Client requests a tips/scroll window.

packets.name: Unicode Prompt Response
packets.description: Client responds to a Unicode text prompt.

related.note: Unicode Prompt packet that triggered this response

packets.name: Set Update Range
packets.description: Client requests to change update range. Server ignores and sends back fixed range.

packets.name: Configuration File
packets.description: Client sends configuration data. Currently ignored by server.

packets.name: Logout Request
packets.description: Client requests to logout.

packets.name: Crash Report
packets.description: Client sends crash/error report.
